author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous and satirical, might contain references to wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In realms of number, wits, and trade,
Pricewaterhouse doth forge the blade –
A billion crowns, they scribe and pay
To Generative AI's sway.
In ChatGPT's grasp, the monks shall learn
Whilst chalices of knowledge turn.

With cyber chiefs now on the prowl,
To ward off ill, we hear them growl.
And as they quest, their sacred trust,
To harness artful power just;
The Schneider CIO doth sing,
In screen and stone, protection bring.

Now turn our quills, from East to West,
To lands where dawning sun doth rest.
Upon the land, where turtles talk,
Two empires pledge to shield and balk –
With Seoul in tow, the dragons sleep,
Whilst secrets of the flame they keep.

feedItems.title: PricewaterhouseCoopers to Pour $1 Billion Into Generative AI
feedItems.description: Multiyear investment in U.S. business includes accessing ChatGPT maker OpenAI’s language model, training staff in AI capabilities.

feedItems.title: Cyber Chiefs Forge Partnerships With Physical Security Units As Combined Threats Grow
feedItems.description: AI can help identify potential cyber-physical attacks, says Schneider Electric CIO Elizabeth Hackenson.

feedItems.title: U.S., South Korea Pledge Cooperation on Nuclear Arms
feedItems.description: Seoul has agreed not to develop its own arsenal in exchange for more of a say in planning a potential American nuclear response to a North Korean attack.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
In distant halls, where wisdom blends,
The noble schools their knowledge send,
No more doth homework's weight compel,
Nor deadlines ring fair equity's knell.
For mastery and hardships' balm, they clasp,
Yet games be played; a fickle grasp.

In mighty halls, with voices deep,
The worldly men, they spin and reap;
A clattering pool of messages,
Born of misunderstandings and distresses.
Through ways uncounted, they speak and tire,
Their words misfire, t'wards ire aspire.

From glistening lands of wealth and power,
Came SPACs upon this earthly bower,
With riches laid before their keep,
Yet now they dwindle, to the deep.
Once filled with promise, now at court,
In bankruptcy's cold hands, they're caught.

feedItems.title: Schools Are Ditching Homework, Deadlines in Favor of 'Equitable Grading'
feedItems.description: The changes aim to measure mastery and account for hardships at home, though teachers say some students are gaming the system.

feedItems.title: So Many Ways to Communicate at Work, So Many Ways to Misfire
feedItems.description: Workplaces have become saturated with ways to talk, often breeding mistakes and misunderstandings.

feedItems.title: SPACs Delivered Easy Money, Now Companies Are Running Out
feedItems.description: The SPAC boom took hundreds of risky companies to the stock market. The next stop for many is bankruptcy court.

author.name: Conchobar mac Nessa
author.description: An Irish bard who doth sing of the battles and triumphs of his people, preserving their traditions and history.

newsMedieval:
In Lafayette, midst of verdant plain,
Two quarters hence, their title did maintain,
'Midst Midwest Cities, proud atop the stand,
Their rank they won, by Nessa's guiding hand.

Gainst equinox of spring, fair Eire's eyes
Behold her markets rise, with gold they prize,
As metro realms did range and jockey for their stake,
In list unscroll'd, by WSJ they made.

Then turn we eye to Korea's fate,
As darkling clouds o'erhang their states,
Economy doth dim, tho' stocks do gleam,
An auld enigma calls, by heavens dreamt.

feedItems.title: Midwest Cities Topped WSJ Housing Index in First Quarter
feedItems.description: Lafayette, Ind., led the index for the second consecutive quarter.

feedItems.title: See Full Rankings for WSJ/Realtor.com's Spring Emerging Housing Markets Index
feedItems.description: Here is how metro areas across the U.S. stack up in the newly updated spring 2023 rankings.

feedItems.title: Korea's Stock Market Shines Even as Economy Dims
feedItems.description: Should a slowing economy lead to a weak stock market? Not judging by the performance of Korea’s benchmark index this year.
